channel.title: [317] SolitaryPvP || New Server || Great Players || New Eco || Nice Staff || JO
channel.description:
*Note* Don't let the name fool you, it's an eco/pk server.
*****[u][b][size=large]DROP PARTY AT 10 PLAYERS!![/size][/b][/u]****** (Currently at 7)
[size=large]SolitaryPvP[/size] [img]http://i1299.photobucket.com/albums/ag74/GfxDesignerRainz/0ee2b695-a2c3-4cb9-bc3d-368a46042b3e_zpsa50a4fe8.jpg[/img]
Links: [url=http://www.solitarypvp.com/webclient]Webclient[/url] [url=http://solitarypvp.pandaboards.com/]Forums[/url] [url=http://www.solitarypvp.com/donate/donate.php]Donate[/url] [url=http://www.runelocus.com/toplist/vote-31199.html]Vote[/url]
Brand new rsps just got put online. Great eco, dedicated players, and great staff.
This server is an eco based server with a great eco. I have added new commands, customs, and other items in game. I have spent 3 weeks coding and preparing for the upcoming of the server. Go ahead and look around!
*NOTE* Will be adding more when I get the time! It's a great server and you will find that out when you logon

item.dc:creator: @Stealmojo Stealmojo
item.description:
@Stealmojo wrote:

I’ll wait to see what else you add, and then I’ll see if I want to check it out.

Read full topic
